price: Pero si te desobedecen, diles: "Yo no soy responsable de cómo obran".
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
